about_the_game:
Follow Samuel , Sarah, and Clunky, on a perilous journey through Relic Odyssey: Ruins of Xantao. Brace yourself as you confront disgusting beasts, ruthless smugglers, and the enigmatic "Collector" - a mad man who will stop at nothing to obtain the power hidden within the ruins of Xantao.








Fight off creatures using an array of weapons and gadgets. Experience different types of enemies and fighting styles as you make your way through research centres, lairs, and ruins!








Scan for enemies and resources using your AVARITE POWERED GLOVES! Have fun pushing and pulling enemies through lairs and ruins. Use this same ability to manipulate your environment!

Collect resources for CRAFTING new weapons and upgrades! Collect rare resources throughout the lairs and ruins then use them to craft technology like mobile medical bays and upgrades for the drilling rig.





Drill down into the enigmatic depths of the planet Valtar, on a quest to unearth the long-lost city of Xantao. With our PROCEDURALLY GENERATED LEVELS, each descent is a new challenge, presenting new environments, enemies, and treasures.
